version_description: Minor bug fixes and improvements

- New Prepaid Top-Up For A Friend section

- Fix international date/time display

The new MyUMobile App is the fastest and easiest way to manage your U Mobile account on the go!

Features:
•Customise your home screen: Choose what you want to see first, from your usage and billing details to rewards.
•Detailed usage breakdown: Check your personal and/or shared data balance, voice minutes, validity and freebies like Video-Onz data.
•View and pay bills in as little as two taps. 
•Purchase top ups for yourself, for friends, and share credit during emergencies.
•Get add-ons: Subscribe to additional data, voice minutes and SMS straight from the app.
•International Roaming & IDD: Check our rates and activate International Roaming & IDD via the app.
•Locate and redeem exciting rewards: TERER THURSDAY, Birthday Bonuses, U Card Privileges and more!
•Customer support: Tap to call customer care or drop us a line if you need help.

- New HERO Postpaid P68 & P79 plans are supported for Check Usage, Pay Bills and more.
- Upgrade to the new HERO Postpaid P68, P79 & P99 plans through Change Rate Plan.
- New Prepaid UMI 26 & UMI 36 plans available for subscription.
- You can now go green by opting for E-billing through MyUMobile App.

- Free 240 mins IDD calls monthly to Indonesia with RM15 weekly top up.

- Validation of Prepaid subscribers’ registration details  to  ensure that they are updated accurately.
- We will now remind you 72 hours before your saved vouchers(in subscriber rewards) expire. (available 9 February onwards)

-Removal of GST

- Introducing our new Giler Unlimited plans -- GX50 Postpaid and GX30 Prepaid. Unlimited data for all apps at only RM50 and RM30 respectively! Postpaid customers can upsize via the Change Rate Plan screen while Prepaid customers can purchase it via the Add-ons screen. 
For more info, check out u.my/gx
- Hotspot Booster & Turbo Booster passes are now available for GX50 Postpaid & GX30 Prepaid customers! Just purchase the passes from as low as RM3 via the Add-Ons tab. Visit u.my/gx for more info.

- A new Home screen for easier navigation
- Usage-alerts when you are running low on high-speed data quota
- New Notification Inbox – check me regularly for incoming messages & alerts
- Subscriber Rewards section – explore great deals & offers around you
- Pay Bill for friends – Pay a Bill for any of your friends or family members on our U Mobile Postpaid plan
- Supports WeChat SIM – View your account balance

We've refreshed MyUMobile App to offer you a more awesome experience. See what we've got for you:

- Unlock Top Up Voucher yourself through the app. No more hassle of calling the customer service. 
- Explore 'My Voucher' page effortlessly with faster loading speed and smoother scrolling.

We're always here if you have any concerns and we'll continue striving to improve our app.

You asked, we delivered. Explore our MyUMobile App to find out our latest exciting new upgrades.

- We’ve added a new Bahasa Malaysia language selection for you!
- Too busy to pay your bills and is barred? Temporarily unbar your line (valid for 3 days) now.
- We have upgraded our Payment Gateway to make your payment smoother and more secure.
- You can now upgrade to postpaid plans without hassle within app.

It is now easier to find deals near U! Just search via MyUMobile app and we'll show the closest rewards up for grab based on where you are. 

Download now and grab the deals before they run out!
Enjoy an even smoother experience with our newly-added feature. You can now top up or pay your bills with ease via FPX Online Banking!
Hey peeps! We did a little housekeeping so you can feel more at home with us. We made sure those annoying bugs are taken care of, so enjoy your one-stop center of everything U Mobile.

We help you #StaySafe with the latest app & security updates! Not just that, we make it easier for you to submit feedback & enquiries via the app, #SenangJe kan?

Tap the update button now!

U are just in time! We’ve made some changes to ease your redemptions for campaign offers and promotions. Plus, enjoy enhanced order processes and general user experience with our improved pop up notifications. Update now for a better, more seamless U Mobile experience!

It's out with the old and in with the new! Say hello to the improved MyUMobile App ‐ now covered with Mandarin language support. Plus, U can easily register for the Jaringan PRIHATIN Programme and enjoy your subsidy with a few simple taps. Update now for a better U Mobile experience!

Coming through with a quick update: we've made sure to improve the app performance and take care of those pesky bugs. So, what are you waiting for? Update to the latest v3.6.3 now to enjoy a smoother MyUMobile app experience!

Coming through with a quick update: we’ve made sure to improve the app performance and take care of those pesky bugs. So, what are you waiting for? Update to the latest v3.6.4 now to enjoy a smoother MyUMobile app experience!

U asked, we delivered! Now U can self-register
your new SIM easily via MyUMobile App. We’ve also added new Add-ons packages and squashed some bugs while we’re at it. Update to the latest v3.7.0 of MyUMobile App to unlock a more seamless experience!

Head out into the new normal with new updates on your MyUMobile App. Say hello to location-based push notifications that will help U discover deals and receive updates whenever, wherever U are. Plus, enjoy added security and peace of mind with the new data encryption function. Update now for a more seamless experience!
We made some enhancements for your overall in-app security and experience. Manage your account share credit top up and pay your bills with ease. Update your MyUMobile App today!

We made some improvements to enhance your in-app security and experience! You can now log in to your account in no time with biometric login and do more with your MyUMobile App today. Wait no more, update your app now!
